constituent: speckled, king, jewel, ball, sentence, plaid, kilt, Billy Connolly, king2, jewel2, ball2
koohiiStory1: Speckled is a pattern, like plaid, but with lots of little balls all over the place.
koohiiStory2: The sentences exchanged between the two kings got more and more heated, finally leading to a fight which left the whole area speckled with blood.
